item.title: Strong smell of urine on the Chiltern court/wonderpass walkway, 25th August
item.description:
There is the strong smell of urine on the corner of Chiltern court/wonderpass walkway near the accessorize. The pavement need to be washed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Allsop Place, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping from Nursery, 25th August
item.description:
The bin is full outside the nursery. There are constant fly tippings here which are usually child related ie toys, car seats etc… these filing cabinets are clearly from the nursery as well. If you were to fly tip these you would do it where you wouldn’t be seen not in a high traffic area like this. They obviously haven’t come far.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daly Drive, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary road sign left abandoned after works, 25th August

item.title: Car not moved for 3 months, taxed but MOT ran out 27 June., 25th August
item.description:
Car parked at top end of street not in residents parking area. Under a tree, now covered in muck, hasn't moved in months. Taxed June 1st but MOT ran out June 27th. Renault Kadjar white LY18FHR. Eyesore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Forde Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive amounts of plants and pots on a public walkway leading to Mount Street Garden., 25th August
item.description:
This issue has now become a liability. It’s taking up half of the entrance to Mount Street Park. In the evenings people are urinating in pots once the gate is closed. When I first moved here, there was one or two pots now there’s dozens. One has to give away to people coming in or out of the park entrance as there’s no space. The overspilling plants and pots have now engulfed the entrance to Mount Street Park. I think it’s become quite a dangerous issue With the possibilities of potential mugs actually hiding behind these bushes once the park is closed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, South Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish_Bus Stop X_EN2, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chase Side, London
